page_description.home: Cherry Studio AI is a powerful multi-model AI assistant supporting iOS, macOS, and Windows platforms. Quickly switch between multiple advanced LLM models to boost work and study efficiency.
page_description.download: Download Cherry Studio AI client supporting Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms. Integrates 100+ AI models, completely free and open source.
page_description.enterprise: Cherry Studio Enterprise provides private deployment AI productivity platform for modern teams and enterprises, supporting model management, permission control, and data security.
page_description.theme: Discover and share beautiful Cherry Studio themes to personalize your AI assistant interface. Supports both light and dark mode themes.
page_description.careers: Join Cherry Studio core team. Looking for AI Native full-stack engineers to build next-gen AI products.

contribution.title: I want to contribute to the project, what can I do?
contribution.description: If you like our project, please give us a star on <1>Github</1> to simply support us. If you are a technical expert, you are welcome to become one of our contributors. Of course, you can also participate in our documentation editing, share your experience with everyone, or answer questions for other users in the community. If you have any ideas or suggestions, please contact us via GitHub Issues or in the official community.

banner.multi_provider_client: AI conversation client with multi-provider integration
banner.multi_provider_description: Cherry Studio currently supports the integration of most service providers on the market and supports unified scheduling of models from multiple service providers.
banner.no_privacy_leak: No need to worry about privacy leakage
banner.local_storage_description: All your usage data is stored locally and will not be uploaded to any third-party servers, and it supports model calls deployed locally.
banner.knowledge_base_description: Cherry Studio has now launched the knowledge base function, which supports importing files in various formats and importing web pages to build your personalized knowledge base.

features.title: Unlock the Power of AI
features.description: From creative conversations to knowledge management, enjoy a complete AI experience. Learn more in the <1>Official Documentation</1>.

conversation.title: AI Chat
conversation.description: In addition to basic AI conversations, it can also help you with document or image conversations, and even formula and HTML previews.

drawing.title: AI Drawing
drawing.description: Supports a variety of drawing models, so you can give full play to your imagination and let Cherry Studio help you complete it.

translation.title: AI Translation
translation.description: Whether it's the translation page or the conversation bar, Cherry Studio can quickly translate the content you enter.

assistants.title: 1000+ Built-in Assistants
assistants.description: Cherry Studio has built-in thousands of assistants in various categories, making you more efficient when using AI.

knowledge_base.title: Multi-source Knowledge Base
knowledge_base.description: Whether it's a local file or a web page, it can be used as a knowledge source to quickly build your exclusive knowledge base.

backup.title: Multiple Backup Methods
backup.description: Including local backup and cloud backup, worry-free switching between multiple devices, more convenient and safer.

intro.title: Project Introduction
intro.description: Cherry Studio is a multi-platform AI client that supports Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms, with mobile support coming in the future. Since July 2024, the project has released hundreds of updates. We are committed to creating a more efficient, secure, and user-friendly client that allows more people to enjoy the convenience of AI.

goal.title: Cherry Studio's Goals
goal.description: Cherry Studio is dedicated to allowing users to focus on creation or enjoying the convenience of AI, rather than being shut out by various complicated configurations. Therefore, you only need to fill in the API key to start using it immediately. We also provide detailed usage documentation for your reference and learning. Our community is also very active and can quickly help you solve various usage problems.

contribution.title: I want to contribute to the project, what can I do?
contribution.description: If you like our project, welcome to give us a star on <1>Github</1> to simply support us. If you are a technical expert, you are welcome to become one of our contributors. Of course, you can also participate in our documentation editing to share your usage experience with everyone or help answer questions for other users in the community. If you have any ideas or suggestions, feel free to contact us through GitHub Issues or in the official community.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about the Enterprise Edition

items.question: Is Express Edition really a one-time payment for lifetime use? Are there other costs?
items.answer: Yes, ¥5,000 for permanent software license, plus ¥5,000 for initial model usage credits. Subsequent model fees are deducted based on actual usage. From the second year, you can optionally pay ¥1,000/year for updates and technical support - the software remains usable even without this.

items.question: Does "unlimited seats" mean I can create accounts for any number of people? Will it affect performance?
items.answer: Yes, one license supports unlimited employees within your company without per-seat fees. Performance mainly depends on your server configuration, not the number of users.

items.question: What's the difference between Express Edition and Community Edition?
items.answer: Three key differences: 1) Express has built-in model services, ready to use; 2) Provides enterprise features like employee management and shared knowledge base; 3) Offers official paid technical support. Community Edition is mainly for personal use.

items.question: What models are built into Express Edition? Can I add my own?
items.answer: Built-in models include OpenAI, Anthropic, Google and other top closed-source models, plus DeepSeek, Kimi, Qwen and other quality Chinese models. Express Edition doesn't support adding custom models - choose Enterprise Premium for this need.

items.question: What are the server requirements for private deployment?
items.answer: Typically a basic cloud server or physical server (e.g., 4 cores, 8GB RAM) is sufficient. Official deployment documentation is provided, or choose Tencent Cloud deployment which requires almost no professional DevOps knowledge.

items.question: Is data security guaranteed?
items.answer: With private deployment, all data (employee info, chat records, knowledge base files) is stored on your own servers, never uploaded to any third party. Data security is completely under your control.

testimonials.title: Why Users Love Cherry Studio
testimonials.subtitle: See what our community has to say about Cherry Studio

items.question: What is Cherry Studio?
items.answer: Cherry Studio is a cross-platform desktop client for AI chatbots, supporting Windows, macOS, and Linux. It integrates 300+ AI models from major providers like OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, and supports local models via Ollama and LM Studio. Beyond AI Assistants, Cherry Studio features powerful Agent capabilities - autonomous AI that can think, plan, and act. Give Agent a goal, and it will reason through problems, break them into steps, call the right tools, and execute independently while you stay in control.

items.question: Is Cherry Studio free?
items.answer: Yes, Cherry Studio Community Edition is completely free and open-source under the AGPL-3.0 license. You can use it for personal purposes without any cost. For commercial use, please comply with the AGPL license requirements or contact us for an enterprise license.

items.question: How is my data stored? Is it secure?
items.answer: All your data (chat history, settings, knowledge base files) is stored locally on your device. Cherry Studio never uploads your data to any third-party servers. You have full control over your data privacy. We also support WebDAV backup for syncing across devices.

items.question: Which AI models does Cherry Studio support?
items.answer: Cherry Studio supports 50+ AI providers including OpenAI (GPT-4, GPT-4o), Anthropic (Claude 3.5), Google (Gemini), DeepSeek, Kimi, Qwen, and many more. It also supports local models through Ollama and LM Studio, allowing you to run AI completely offline.

items.question: What is the Knowledge Base feature?
items.answer: The Knowledge Base allows you to import documents (PDF, Word, Excel, TXT, Markdown) and web pages to create your personal AI assistant. The AI can then answer questions based on your imported content, making it perfect for research, document analysis, and personalized Q&A.

items.question: Does Cherry Studio support MCP (Model Context Protocol)?
items.answer: Yes, Cherry Studio fully supports MCP servers, allowing you to extend its capabilities with external tools and services. You can connect to databases, file systems, web services, and more through MCP, making Cherry Studio a powerful AI workspace.

items.question: How can I contribute to the project?
items.answer: You can contribute in many ways: give us a star on GitHub, report bugs, submit pull requests for code improvements, help with documentation, or assist other users in the community. Check our GitHub repository for contribution guidelines and open issues to get started.

items.question: Where can I get help if I have questions?
items.answer: Join our community through Telegram, Discord, or QQ groups (links on our homepage). You can also submit issues on GitHub, email support@cherry-ai.com, or check our documentation at docs.cherry-ai.com for detailed guides and tutorials.

free_models.title: Free Models, Ready to Use

glm.name: BigModel GLM-4.5-Air
glm.description: BigModel's efficient model optimized for intelligent agents, featuring MoE architecture, 128K context, 100+ tokens/sec generation speed. Ideal for code generation, logical reasoning, and agent interactions.

qwen.name: Qwen3-8B
qwen.description: Alibaba's 3rd generation Qwen model, freely provided by SiliconFlow. Supports 119 languages with excellent code generation, mathematical reasoning, and intelligent Q&A capabilities.
